string-array.name: rtt_att_messages
string-array.item: "To use RTT, you need to be connected to LTE or have Wi-Fi calling turned on. "
"You can start using RTT whenever you're communicating with someone whose phone supports RTT or is connected to a TTY device. "
"To see the RTT option for incoming and outgoing calls, set the RTT call option to Always visible. "
"RTT includes audio, so mute the call if you don't need or want to share the audio. "
"RTT calls use voice minutes. Check your rate plan for details. "

string-array.name: rtt_default_messages
string-array.item: "RTT calls are saved as a message transcript. "
"RTT is not available for video calls. "

string-array.name: rtt_tmo_messages
string-array.item: "You will need to be connected to a 4G LTE or Wi-Fi network. "
"The person that you're talking to must also be using a phone that supports RTT or is connected to a TTY (text telephone) device. "
Once you enable RTT, the RTT icon will appear on all incoming calls.
